Title: S7 Ep. 302 Andres Goyanes - Coaching People for the Future of Work
Description:
Andres Goyanes is a personal coach on a mission to help people become their best version of themselves. Andres spent a lot of time thinking about his purpose in life. As he looked forward , he also looked backwards and thought about how he helped people. 


Some really great wisdom nuggets that came out of the show are:

  • Celebrate successes and learn from failures. 
  • Communication is one of the best ways to grow.
  • Advice his dad said when he was growing up. When you own your business, you drop your plate to take care of business.  That is the responsibility of every entrepreneur.

 

Future of Work opportunity for anyone thinking about going into life coaching.  The market is expected to grow at a compound annual growth rate of 4.85% from 2023 to 2030 to reach USD $2.1 billion by 2030. What does this mean for you?  Consider this your side business. As the world continues to work, play, and connect remotely - it will be important to have a coach to help stay balanced.
